page.title: 16LIPTON'S, REDRUTH
page.content:
REDRUTH LIPTONS
THE BIGGEST GROCERY STORE IN REDRUTH IS {LIPTON'S.}IT HAS STOOD IN FORE STREET FOR TEN YEARS. FORTY PEOPLE WORK THERE, AND FOUR OR FIVE LEAVE AND ARE REPLACED EVERY YEAR. THE SYMBOL{ {LIPTON'S LEAF'}IS A SIGN OF FRESHNESS. THE SHOP OPENS AT 8.30 A.M AND CLOSES AT 5.30 P.M. ROUGHLY ABOUT 12,000 PEOPLE VISIT THE SHOP EACH WEEK. THE SHOP CARRIES ABOUT 500 LITRES OF FIZZY DRINKS IN STOCK. EIGHTY BOXES OF TEA BAGS ARE SOLD EACH DAY. THE SHOP STOCKS FORTY SIDES OF MEAT,AND SELLS TWENTY DIFFERENT KINDS OF FRUIT.EACH DELIVERY OF CHEESE CONTAINS ABOUT FIFTY KINDS.THE SHOP COVERS 72,000 SQ. FT. AND HAS 150 NEON LIGHTS IN USE. THERE ARE 11 MORE LIPTON'S IN CORNWALL.
